content:
This output indicates that there are several processes running with the AppArmor profile "snap.discord.discord". It's possible that Discord is running multiple processes, which may explain the repeated denial messages in the syslog.

To check the status of the AppArmor profile, you can run the following command:
```lua
sudo aa-status | grep snap.discord.discord
```
This command should show you the current status of the AppArmor profile for the Discord snap package, including whether it is in enforce mode or complain mode. If it is in complain mode, it will log policy violations but not enforce them.
